title: Gold mine fire in Peru kills 27 people
description: At least 27 people have died following a fire in a gold mine in Peru - the deadliest mining accident in the country for decades.

title: Two oil tankers seized by Iran spotted in key port city
description: Two oil tankers seized by Iran have been spotted off the coast of one of the country's key port cities on the strategic Strait of Hormuz.

title: Arab League votes to readmit Syria as members begin to normalise ties with President Assad
description: The Arab League has voted to readmit Syria more than a decade after it was suspended following a bloody crackdown on street protests that led to civil war.

title: America's 10 most deadly mass shootings of 2023
description: The US has experienced more mass shootings than days so far in 2023, with thousands dead as a result.

title: At least 12 dead as truck crashes into nine cars and two minibuses in Turkey
description: At least 12 people have been killed and 31 others injured - including three seriously - in a multi-vehicle crash in southern Turkey, officials said.

title: Village turned into 'wasteland' as floods and landslides leave 200 dead
description: More than 200 people have been killed in flash floods and landslides in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo.

title: 'Praying for rain': Thousands forced to evacuate as wildfires ravage Canada
description: Thousands of people have been forced to evacuate their homes as unprecedented wildfires ravage western Canada.

title: Nine dead including suspect after shooting at US shopping mall
description: A gunman has shot and killed eight people and wounded at least seven others at a busy shopping mall in Texas, police have said.
